hero.subtitle: Laundry service solutions for households, rentals, and commercial teams.

categories.description: Natural relief for acute and chronic pain conditions

categories.name: Mental & Emotional Health
categories.description: Support for stress, anxiety, depression, and emotional wellbeing

categories.name: Digestive Health

conditions.title: Back Pain
conditions.description: Whether acute or chronic, acupuncture and TCM therapies provide effective relief for lower back pain, upper back pain, and sciatica without drugs or surgery.
conditions.tcmApproach: TCM views back pain as a blockage of Qi and blood flow in the channels. We use acupuncture to release blockages, cupping to improve circulation, and herbal medicine to reduce inflammation and strengthen the back.

conditions.title: Neck & Shoulder Pain
conditions.description: Find relief from tension, stiffness, and pain in the neck and shoulders caused by stress, poor posture, or injury.
conditions.tcmApproach: Neck and shoulder pain often results from Qi stagnation and blood stasis. We release trigger points with acupuncture, relax tight muscles with Tui Na, and improve circulation with cupping.

conditions.title: Arthritis & Joint Pain
symptoms: Pain that worsens with weather changes
conditions.description: Natural pain management for osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, and general joint inflammation.
conditions.tcmApproach: Arthritis is often seen as a 'Bi Syndrome' involving wind, cold, damp, or heat pathogenic factors blocking the joints. Treatment focuses on expelling these factors, reducing inflammation, and strengthening the body.

conditions.title: Headaches & Migraines
conditions.description: Effective treatment for tension headaches, migraines, and chronic head pain without medication.
conditions.tcmApproach: Headaches have various patterns in TCM including Liver Yang rising, Blood deficiency, or external pathogenic factors. We identify your specific pattern and treat accordingly with acupuncture and herbs.

conditions.title: Anxiety & Panic Disorders
conditions.description: Natural, drug-free support for anxiety, panic attacks, and general nervousness.
conditions.tcmApproach: Anxiety often involves Heart and Kidney disharmony, Liver Qi stagnation, or Shen (spirit) disturbance. We calm the Shen, regulate Qi flow, and nourish the organs to restore emotional balance.

conditions.title: Depression & Low Mood
conditions.description: Holistic support for depression, low energy, and lack of motivation.
conditions.tcmApproach: Depression may involve Liver Qi stagnation, Heart Blood deficiency, or Spleen Qi deficiency. Treatment focuses on moving stagnant Qi, nourishing deficiencies, and lifting the spirit.

conditions.title: Insomnia & Sleep Disorders
conditions.description: Natural solutions for difficulty falling asleep, staying asleep, or poor sleep quality.
conditions.tcmApproach: Sleep problems often stem from Heart and Kidney imbalance, Yin deficiency with heat, or Shen disturbance. We nourish Yin, calm the Heart, and anchor the Shen for restful sleep.

conditions.title: Stress & Burnout
conditions.description: Restore balance and resilience when facing chronic stress or burnout.
conditions.tcmApproach: Chronic stress depletes Qi and causes Liver stagnation. We regulate the Liver, tonify deficiencies, and provide stress management techniques to restore balance and build resilience.

conditions.title: IBS & Digestive Issues
conditions.description: Effective relief for irritable bowel syndrome, bloating, gas, and digestive discomfort.
conditions.tcmApproach: IBS typically involves Liver-Spleen disharmony where stress affects digestion. We regulate Liver Qi, strengthen Spleen function, and harmonize the digestive system.

conditions.title: Acid Reflux & GERD
conditions.description: Natural treatment for heartburn, acid reflux, and gastroesophageal reflux disease.
conditions.tcmApproach: Reflux involves Stomach Qi rebelling upward, often with heat or phlegm. We redirect Stomach Qi downward, clear heat, and strengthen digestive function.

conditions.title: Constipation
conditions.description: Gentle, effective relief for chronic constipation and irregular bowel movements.
conditions.tcmApproach: Constipation may result from Qi stagnation, Blood deficiency, Yin deficiency, or Spleen Qi weakness. Treatment is tailored to your specific pattern to restore normal bowel function.

conditions.title: Fertility Support
conditions.description: Comprehensive support for natural conception and IVF preparation for both women and men.
conditions.tcmApproach: We focus on regulating menstrual cycles, nourishing Kidney Essence (Jing), improving blood flow to reproductive organs, and reducing stress. Treatment is customized to each partner's needs.

conditions.title: Menstrual Disorders
conditions.description: Natural treatment for painful periods, irregular cycles, PMS, and menstrual-related issues.
conditions.tcmApproach: Menstrual issues often involve Liver Qi stagnation, Blood deficiency, or Cold in the uterus. We regulate cycles, nourish Blood, move Qi, and eliminate pathogenic factors.

conditions.title: Menopause Symptoms
conditions.description: Natural relief for hot flashes, night sweats, mood changes, and other menopausal symptoms.
conditions.tcmApproach: Menopause involves Kidney Yin and Yang decline. We nourish Kidney Yin, harmonize Yin and Yang, and calm the Shen to ease the transition and reduce symptoms.

conditions.title: PCOS (Polycystic Ovary Syndrome)
conditions.description: Holistic treatment to regulate hormones, restore cycles, and manage PCOS symptoms.
conditions.tcmApproach: PCOS involves Kidney deficiency, Phlegm-Damp accumulation, and Liver Qi stagnation. Treatment focuses on resolving phlegm, regulating Qi, and nourishing Kidney function.

conditions.title: Allergies & Hay Fever
conditions.description: Natural relief for seasonal allergies, hay fever, and environmental sensitivities.
conditions.tcmApproach: Allergies result from Wei Qi (defensive Qi) weakness and internal imbalances. We strengthen Wei Qi, clear pathogenic factors, and reduce inflammatory responses.

conditions.title: Asthma
conditions.description: Complementary support for asthma management, reducing frequency and severity of attacks.
conditions.tcmApproach: Asthma involves Lung and Kidney deficiency with phlegm accumulation. We strengthen Lung and Kidney function, resolve phlegm, and reduce reactivity.

conditions.title: Chronic Cough
conditions.description: Treatment for persistent cough that hasn't responded to conventional approaches.
conditions.tcmApproach: Chronic cough has various patterns including Lung Yin deficiency, Lung Heat, or Phlegm accumulation. We identify the specific pattern and treat accordingly.

conditions.title: Frequent Colds & Flu
conditions.description: Strengthen immunity to reduce frequency and severity of colds and respiratory infections.
conditions.tcmApproach: Frequent illness indicates Wei Qi deficiency. We strengthen Wei Qi, tonify Lung and Spleen function, and build overall immune resilience.

conditions.title: Chronic Fatigue
conditions.description: Restore energy and vitality when experiencing persistent tiredness and low energy.
conditions.tcmApproach: Chronic fatigue typically involves Qi deficiency of Spleen, Kidney, or both, possibly with Blood deficiency. We tonify the deficiencies and restore vitality.

introduction.note: If your scenario is not listed, contact us for a custom service recommendation.
introduction.text: WeWash supports different laundry workloads, from family weekly cycles to high-turnover business operations. Below are common scenarios we serve.
